ThingDef.label: Hematite ore
ThingDef.description: A piece of rock that is the source of iron and nickel ores.

ThingDef.label: Bauxite ore
ThingDef.description: A piece of rock that is a source of aluminum and iron ores.

ThingDef.label: Tetrahedrite
ThingDef.description: A piece of rock that is the source of copper ore.

ThingDef.label: Cassiterite
ThingDef.description: A piece of rock that is the source of tin and lead ore.

ThingDef.label: Sphalerite
ThingDef.description: A piece of rock that is the source of zink ore.

ThingDef.label: Chromite ore
ThingDef.description: A piece of rock that is the source of chromite, iron and titanium ore.

ThingDef.label: Coal
ThingDef.description: Coal is an excellent source of energy and light.

ThingDef.label: Crennerite
ThingDef.description: A piece of rock that is the source of gold and silver ore.

ThingDef.label: Salt
ThingDef.description: Colorless crystals of salt with admixtures of minerals.

ThingDef.label: Salt crystal
ThingDef.description: Large salt formations formed in an extremely saline environment.

ThingDef.label: Small salt crystal
ThingDef.description: Salt formations formed in an extremely saline environment.

ThingDef.label: Magnesium ore
ThingDef.description: A piece of rock that is the source of gold and silver ore.

ThingDef.label: Ilmenite ore
ThingDef.description: A piece of rock that is the source of gold and silver ore.

ThingDef.label: Skutterudite ore
ThingDef.description: A piece of rock that is the source of gold and silver ore.
